title: IT Tekniker
description:
### **Din nya roll**


Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens IT-miljö där stabilitet möter innovation? Vi söker nu en drivande IT-tekniker med passion för containerbaserade plattformar som vill vara en nyckelspelare i utvecklingen, driften och förvaltningen av vår kunds moderna IT-infrastruktur.


Som IT-tekniker kommer du att arbeta i ett engagerat team som ansvarar för deras containerplattformar baserade på OpenShift och Kubernetes. Du bidrar till att skapa robusta, skalbara och säkra lösningar som stödjer en samhällsviktig verksamhet med höga krav på tillgänglighet och kvalitet.

**Du kommer att:**

* Utveckla, drifta och förvalta containerbaserade plattformar.
* Säkerställa hög stabilitet och prestanda i produktionsmiljöer.
* Automatisera och effektivisera driftprocesser.
* Arbeta med kontinuerliga förbättringar och kvalitetshöjande åtgärder.
* Samarbeta med andra tekniska specialister inom olika ”towers” och delområden.

### **För att bli framgångsrik i denna roll behöver du**

* Minst 3 års arbete med storskalig IT drift för organisationer med minst 1 000 användare
* Minst 3 års arbete med RedHat Openshift kluster och drift med installation
* Minst 3 års arbete med Transaktionsservers
* Minst 3 års arbete med Java applikations servers
* Minst 5 års arbete med Linux Rhel
* Minst 5 års arbete inom Container-teknik. (Openshift/Kubernetes).
* Minst 5 års arbete av automatiserade leveranser mot CAP (CI/CD).
* Minst 5 års arbete med programmering/skriptspråk (Phyton och Java).
* Meriterande: Har arbetat med Agil team planering (Safe/Skrum/Kanban).
* Meriterande: Erfarenhet av Weblogic Applikationsserver
* Meriterande: Erfarenhet av Wildfly Applikationsserver
* Meriterande: Erfarenhet av Casual Transaktion server

### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och trivs i en tekniskt avancerad miljö. Du har erfarenhet av containerteknik och ett genuint intresse för drift, utveckling och modern plattformsteknologi.

### **Välkommen med din ansökan**

  

Anställningens omfattning: Heltid, 100%  

Anställningsform: Tidsbegränsad anställning som konsult via JobBusters.  

Start: Enligt överenskommelse  

Slut: TBD  

Utvalda förmåner: Kollektivavtal, Friskvårdsbidrag, Benifex med mera  

I din ansökan: *säkerställ att det tydligt framgår att du är kvalificerad utefter kundens önskade kvalifikationer.*

  

### **Bra att känna till!**


Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande. Då processerna i konsultvärlden ofta går snabbt kan tjänsten tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum – vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan!


Du behöver inte skriva ett personligt brev utan i stället ber vi dig svara på urvalsfrågorna i samband med ansökan.


### **Företagspresentation**


Vår kund är en av Sveriges största offentliga organisationer med ett viktigt samhällsuppdrag – att bidra till trygghet och välfärd för människor i hela landet. Hos dem står digitalisering och innovation i fokus, och deras IT-verksamhet är en av de mest omfattande i Sverige. Här får du arbeta med modern teknik, bidra till lösningar som gör skillnad och utvecklas i en trygg och inkluderande miljö.

title: Solution Specialist (Cloud & AI)
description:
Join us in shaping the future of AI innovation with Microsoft Azure!  

We are looking for a passionate and customer-obsessed Solution Specialist (Cloud & AI) to join our Digital Natives team in either in North Europe or South Europe. In this role, you will engage with some of the most innovative and disruptive start-ups and scale-ups, helping them unlock the full potential of Azure across different solution areas: from Agentic AI to Application Development to Developer Productivity.  

As a trusted advisor, you will lead strategic customer engagements, drive solution envisioning and accelerate adoption of Azure services. You will work closely with Solution Engineers, partners and engineering teams to deliver business outcomes through secure, scalable and AI-powered cloud solutions. Your ability to connect business needs with technical capabilities to generate and accelerate pipeline will be instrumental in helping these fast-growing companies accelerate their growth and build the next generation of AI-native applications.  

This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of Microsoft’s AI and cloud transformation, influencing how Digital Native customers build, secure and scale their solutions on Azure.  

Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.**Responsibilities**
--------------------

* **Drive Customer Engagements**: Lead customer conversations focused on Azure Security, Developer Productivity and Copilot Studio. Understand customer priorities and map them to Microsoft’s solution plays to drive value and differentiation.
* **Accelerate Solution Adoption**: Own the sales strategy and execution for your territory. Activate solution plays such as “Innovate With Azure AI Apps and Agents", "Win Software Developers with GitHub" or "Unify your Data Platform".
* **Orchestrate Technical Teams**: Collaborate with Cloud Solution Architects, Solution Engineers and Partners to deliver compelling demos, workshops, and proof-of-value engagements that showcase Azure’s capabilities.
* **Empower Developers**: Promote GitHub and Azure DevOps to improve developer velocity, CI/CD practices, and secure code development. Guide customers in leveraging Copilot and Copilot Studio to boost productivity and innovation.
* **Pipeline and Opportunity Management**: Identify, qualify, and progress opportunities through the sales cycle. Use digital signals and AI-assisted insights to prioritise accounts and drive co-sell motions with partners.
* **Customer Success and Growth**: Ensure customers realise value from their Azure investments. Drive consumption, renewals, and expansion by aligning solutions to business outcomes.
* **Continuous Learning and Enablement**: Stay current on Azure innovations, industry trends, and competitive landscape. Share best practices and contribute to a culture of learning and collaboration.

**Qualifications**
------------------

**Required/Minimum Qualifications (RQs/MQs)*** Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field AND/OR solid experience in technology-related sales or account management experience
* Proven ability to lead strategic sales engagements for cloud and AI platforms, leveraging technical knowledge


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.
company_description: Our mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

title: Software Engineer med 5+ års erfarenhet
description:
**Välkommen till Custodia Consulting - Upptäck möjligheterna att växa med oss!**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Vi söker erfarna mjukvaruutvecklare till spännande uppdrag hos våra kunder inom industri, teknik och tillverkning. Hos Custodia bygger vi högkompetenta team med stark integritet och teknisk spets, alltid med fokus på långsiktighet, kvalitet och kundvärde.

  


**Om tjänsten**
---------------


Hur din roll ser ut hos oss beror på vem du är. Vi formar uppdrag och utveckling tillsammans med dig – baserat på din erfarenhet, dina styrkor och vad du vill framåt.Du kanske har din spets inom inbyggda system, backend eller dataplattformar? Oavsett startpunkt jobbar vi långsiktigt med din tekniska och konsultmässiga utveckling.


Som mjukvaruutvecklare hos Custodia så varierar uppdragen men du arbetar generellt sett med utveckling, integration och förbättring av mjukvarusystem i komplexa och tekniktunga miljöer. Beroende på uppdrag kan fokus ligga på inbyggda system, dataplattformar eller backend-lösningar. Du kommer att vara en nyckelperson i att skapa robusta och framtidssäkra mjukvarulösningar som gör skillnad i kundens vardag.

**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------

* Utveckla, testa och dokumentera mjukvarulösningar enligt kravspecifikation
* Bidra till systemdesign, arkitektur och val av teknologier
* Arbeta agilt i tvärfunktionella team med andra utvecklare, testare och domänexperter
* Driva förbättringar kring prestanda, kvalitet och utvecklingsflöde
* Delta i code reviews, teststrategier och tekniska beslut


Du kommer även att vara en del utav Custodia teamet där du kommer att ha en direkt inverkan på vår kultur, värdegrund och utveckling.

  


**Vi söker dig som**
--------------------

* Har relevant högskole- eller civilingenjörsutbildning inom data, elektroteknik eller liknande
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av professionell mjukvaruutveckling
* Har goda kunskaper i ett eller flera av följande: C/C++, Python, Java, Embedded Linux, Git, CI/CD, Simulink eller liknande
* Van att arbeta i agila miljöer (Scrum, Kanban)
* Kommunikativ och lösningsorienterad – på svenska och engelska


##### **Det är meriterande om du har**

* Erfarenhet från fordonsindustrin, Life Science eller annan reglerad bransch
* Kunskap inom inbyggda system, realtidssystem eller sensorsystem
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar, DevOps eller cybersäkerhet

##### **För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**

* Strukturerad och analytisk
* En lagspelare som gillar att dela kunskap
* Självständig med driv att utveckla både teknik och relationer

**Om oss**
----------


Custodia Consulting är ett konsultbolag med fokus på kvalitet, långsiktighet och värdeskapande. Vi verkar inom projektledning, teknik samt Life Science och bygger mångsidiga team som levererar med hög integritet.


Vi erbjuder en plattform för både professionell och personlig utveckling, där alla medarbetare är med och formar företagets kultur och tillväxt.


Läs mer om oss här.


##### **Våra kärnvärden:**

* **Integritet** - Vi tar ansvar och är ett dedikerat och pålitligt team.
* **Kvalitet** - Vi levererar fantastiska resultat utan kompromisser.
* **Inkludering** - Vi bygger starka team med olika bakgrund
  
* 
* 

  

##### **Din karriär hos oss:**


Vår passion för tillväxt och utveckling sträcker sig inte bara till våra kunder, utan även till våra medarbetare. Som ett växande konsultbolag erbjuder vi spännande karriärmöjligheter där du kan växa och blomstra tillsammans med oss.


Vi tror på att investera i våra talanger och skapa en miljö där du kan utvecklas professionellt och personligt.


Samtliga konsulter på Custodia har även en affärsmässig roll för att bidra till bolagsetableringen och tillväxten.


**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
---------------------------


Vi tillämpar löpande urval. Första steget är en telefonintervju, där vi går igenom din bakgrund och motivation. Därefter följer en djupintervju, där vi utforskar din kompetens och erfarenhet mer ingående.


Vi strävar efter en objektiv och rättvis rekryteringsprocess och arbetar aktivt för att motverka diskriminering i enlighet med diskrimineringsgrunderna. Vår målsättning är att rekrytera på ett inkluderande och kompetensbaserat sätt, där alla kandidater bedöms utifrån sina meriter.

**Gå med oss på Custodia och skapa en framgångsrik karriär!**
-------------------------------------------------------------


Läs mer på våran hemsida.

title: IT Support Technician, Business Sweden, Stockholm
description:
**Business Sweden is establishing an internal servicedesk function and is now looking for a dedicated and solution-oriented support technician to join from the start. You will be the first point of contact for our global employees regarding technical issues and play a key role in ensuring high quality and efficiency in our daily IT delivery.** 




  





 Business Sweden helps Swedish companies grow global sales and international companies invest and expand in Sweden. With a local presence in more than 40 markets, we offer both strategic advice and hands-on support to companies of all sizes and in a wide range of industries. The IT & Digitalisation department is an important function to support business needs.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Receive, register, and manage incoming IT support requests via phone, email, and ticketing system.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to hardware, software, networks, and user accounts.
* Escalate more complex issues to second line support or external vendors.
* Document solutions and contribute to our internal knowledge base.
* Actively contribute to improving our support processes.



  





 The role is based in Stockholm, but you will work closely with and support our teams around the world. You report to the IT Operations Manager within the IT & Digitalisation function. We apply probationary employment in all applicable positions.
 



  





**Working hours:** 




 The position involves shift work on weekdays between 06:00 and 22:00 according to a rolling four-week schedule. Shifts are planned in advance and may vary within these hours. Flexibility and the ability to adapt to different working hours are therefore important. Some on-call duty may also be required if needed.
 



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**Core competencies and collaborative skills** 



* Demonstrate commitment, honesty, and accountability in tasks.
* Provide support and take ownership to ensure high quality delivery on time. Structured and prioritize effectively.
* Collaborate effectively to achieve good results with a service-minded and positive can-do attitude.
* Contribute to team spirit and transparent communication.
* A problem solver who easily adapts to new ways of working.
* Voice your own ideas and share opinions. Show appreciation for different perspectives.



  





**Formal requirements** 



* Secondary education in IT or equivalent experience.
* Previous experience in a service desk or similar support function - preferably from employment, but relevant internship experience is also relevant.
* Solid knowledge of Windows, Microsoft 365, and ticketing systems.
* You have a high level of proficiency in English and Swedish.
* Experience from working in an international context is a plus.



  





**Application** 




 Please submit your CV and cover letter in English as soon as possible as we will be screening applications on a rolling basis. No later than 23 November 2025. Your application will be handled confidentially.

title: IT-systemtekniker
description:
Är du en självgående IT-systemtekniker som vill forma och ta ägarskap över en intern och extern IT-funktion? Vill du ha friheten att arbeta "högt och lågt", från daglig drift till strategisk design och se din direkta påverkan i ett stabilt techbolag?
 



  





**Crediflow** 
 är en ledande partner för digital affärskommunikation som hjälper företag att automatisera sina affärsflöden. I takt med att vi växer tar vi nu det första, avgörande steget för att strukturera upp vår interna och externa IT-drift. Vi söker en nyckelperson som vill ta fullt ägarskap över våra IT-miljöer och forma dem för framtiden. 
 



  





 Vi är ett stabilt, lönsamt bolag och stolta över att vara certifierade som en "Healthy Place to Work". 
 



  





**Rollen?** 




 Som IT-Systemtekniker på Crediflow är du motorn i vår interna IT. Ditt uppdrag är att självständigt driva, förvalta och utveckla
 *hela* 
 vår IT-infrastruktur. Detta är en bred "doer"-roll där du får ett enormt ägarskap över den tekniska miljön på våra kontor och i våra datacenter.
 



 Du kommer att vara den enda personen dedikerad till intern IT och drift och rapporterar direkt till vår CTO, som agerar bollplank och mentor. Målet är att du efter en inkörningsperiod ska kunna driva arbetet proaktivt och självständigt, med full frihet och eget ansvar. 
 



  





**Dina ansvarsområden:** 



* Ansvara för drift, underhåll och livscykelhantering av vår totala lokala IT-infrastruktur (nätverk, VMware, backup).
* Driva och förvalta vår klientmiljö med moderna verktyg (Microsoft Azure, Intune, Forticlient EMS).
* Aktivt arbeta med IT-säkerhet (patchning, brandväggar, ISO 27001).
* Livscykelhantera vår driftmiljö i våra datacenter, föra dialog med vår driftleverantör och komma med proaktiva förslag.
* Ge teknisk support till våra medarbetare och agera som den centrala punkten för all intern IT och drift.



  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  





 🤝
 **Forma och Äg Funktionen:** 
 Bli den första dedikerade personen för vår interna IT/drift och få ansvaret att strukturera upp en central funktion.
 



  





 🚀
 **Äkta frihet & ägarskap:** 
 Få nycklarna till vår IT-miljö och friheten att driva utvecklingen med dina egna idéer och initiativ. 
 



  





 📈
 **Väx genom ansvar, inte titlar:** 
 Ta chansen att fördjupa din kompetens och kliva in på nya, strategiska driftområden. 
 



  





 ❤️
 **En bevisat hälsosam arbetsplats:** 
 Bli en del av ett företag som genuint bryr sig, certifierat som en "Healthy Place to Work". 
 



  





**Vem söker vi?** 




  




* Du har minst 2-3 års erfarenhet från en liknande bred roll (IT-tekniker, systemadministratör, drifttekniker).
* Du har god erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure och Windows Server/AD.
* Du har en god förståelse för nätverk, IT-säkerhet och Kubernetes.
* Du är en "doer" som inte väntar på att få uppgifter, utan ser vad som behöver göras och tar tag i det.
* Du är strukturerad och har ett genuint intresse för att förbättra och automatisera processer.
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska.



  





**Praktisk information:** 
 Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor i Täby, Stockholm.
 



  





**Intresserad?** 
 Vi håller processen snabb och transparent, rätt talang ska inte behöva vänta. Läs mer och ansök via länken!

title: Director, IT Transformation Consulting, Defense
description:
**Director / Senior Director – IT Consulting (Defence Sector)**
**Location: Sweden | Hybrid Work Model**
 Are you a senior leader with deep roots in the Swedish defense or military sector? Have you led strategic technology initiatives, advised top decision-makers, or driven transformation within Försvarsmakten, FMV, FRA, or similar organizations? If you're now curious about how your expertise could shape the future of defense capabilities, Gartner Consulting in the Nordics would like to meet you.
   

  

**Why Gartner Consulting?**
 At Gartner, we help governments and public sector organizations stay ahead of the curve—leveraging technology to deliver real impact. Backed by Gartner’s world-class Business & Technology Insights, our consultants provide independent, data-driven advice that improves citizen outcomes, optimizes taxpayer value, and enhances operational efficiency.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 We’re expanding our Strategy & Technology Consulting team in Stockholm and are looking for a visionary leader with deep defense/military experience.
   

  

 Whether you’ve worked in a consultative role within the Swedish Armed Forces or have led major IT transformations in a defense ministry or agency (internally or representing a consulting firm), your insights are invaluable and we would like to hear from you.
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone who thrives at the intersection of strategy, technology, and leadership—and is ready to bring that experience into a dynamic, open and inclusive consulting environment.
   

  

 If you feel that you fit some of the criteria (even if not all), we encourage you to get in touch - we are passionate about bringing talent from a wide range of backgrounds.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Advise senior leaders in defense and military organizations on technology strategy and innovation.
* Deliver insights on operating models, organizational design, digital transformation, and governance.
* Support decision-making with data-driven analysis, helping clients optimize IT investments and drive mission success.
* Lead engagements across areas such as cloud transformation, applications modernization, sourcing strategy, and program assurance.


**What We’re Looking For**
 We’re seeking candidates who can operate at the highest strategic level. You may have:
   

  

* Extensive experience in technology-led transformation within the Swedish defense ecosystem (e.g., Försvarsmakten, FMV, FRA, Fortifikationsverket).
* A strong understanding of strategic planning, IT governance, and digital innovation in military contexts.
* Experience in consultative roles—either within a consulting firm or as an internal advisor.
* Familiarity with frameworks for CIO advisory, value realization, and program assurance.
* A relevant academic background (MBA or military equivalent is a plus).
* A passion for shaping the future of defense through technology.


**Why Join Us?**
 This is a unique opportunity to join a world-class consulting team with a proven track record in the defense sector. You’ll work alongside experts who understand the mission-critical nature of defense operations and are committed to delivering meaningful change.
   

  

 Whether you're transitioning from a long career in the armed forces or looking to expand your impact in a new way—Gartner Consulting offers the platform, the people, and the purpose to make it happen.
   

  

**Our Team Culture**
 At Gartner Consulting Nordics, we believe that great work starts with great people. You’ll be part of a team that is anchored in shared values, deep technology expertise, and a strong sense of purpose. We foster a culture of trust, collaboration, and continuous learning—where every voice is valued and every contribution matters.
   

  

 We also believe in flexibility. Our consultants enjoy the freedom to work from wherever they perform best—whether that’s from home, the office, or on-site with clients. What unites us is not where we work, but how we work: with integrity, curiosity, and a commitment to making a difference.
   

  

**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective business and technology insights, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to 21,000 associates globally who support ~14,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our vast, virtually untapped market potential offers limitless opportunities – opportunities that may not even exist right now – for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
   

  

 Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.
   

  

 Job Requisition ID:100815
   

  

 By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
   

  

 Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy
   

  

**For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.**

title: Studio Assistant Intern
description:
**Company Description** 




 Chisel Design AB, based in Stockholm, specializes in Art, Paint, and Design services for both commercial and residential properties, as well as company vehicles. The company prides itself on delivering high-quality visual art and paintwork tailored to customer needs. Additionally, Chisel Design AB operates Chisel Studios, a versatile art space that supports local artists and fosters community engagement. Through its creative expertise, the company blends functionality with artistic expression to inspire its clients and community.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 Chisel Studios is seeking a
 **Studio Assistant Intern** 
 to support our daily art studio operations and community art events. This part-time position is ideal for someone who is a creator, loves art, and really enjoys being organized.
 



  





 As a Studio Assistant, you will help with
 **studio administration, event coordination, and creative production** 
 . You’ll assist during public art events, manage and schedule content for our
 **social media platforms** 
 (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn), and help maintain the studio’s day-to-day flow.
 



  





 You’ll also support the team with
 **art-related tasks** 
 , such as picking up materials, assisting with large-scale paintings, cleaning brushes, scanning and documenting artworks, organizing files and receipts, and coordinating studio bookings.
 



 The position offers
 **flexibility in work days and hours** 
 , but a semi-consistent schedule is required. This internship runs for
 **6 months** 
 , with a
 **two-week notice period** 
 on both sides. Our goal is to grow this position into a
 **permanent paid role** 
 for the right candidate.
 



  





**Qualifications & Skills** 



* Strong organizational and administrative abilities
* English proficiency (Swedish a plus)
* Punctual, reliable, and able to follow instructions carefully
* Proactive and comfortable asking clarifying questions
* Eye for art and detail — enjoys visual aesthetics and creative environments
* Comfortable using social media platforms and basic office tools
* Knowledge of art, design, or creative production is a PLUS
* Photography or documentation skills beneficial
* Previous experience in a creative or administrative role is an advantage



**What We Offer (Intern Perks)** 




 Although this internship is
 **unpaid** 
 , we are committed to making it a valuable and supportive experience. Interns at Chisel Studios receive:
 


* 🎨
 **2 Free Tickets per Month** 
 to our Creative Art events
* 🖼️
 **Free Access to the Art Studio** 
 for personal projects during open/unbooked hours
* 💼
 **Assistance with Migrationsverket** 
 paperwork or processes (if applicable)
* 🏛️
 **No Booking Fees** 
 for hosting your own exhibition or pop-up event at the studio
* 📝
 **Letters of Recommendation & Written References** 
 upon successful completion
* 🔍
 **Career Support** 
 — we’ll assist with job searching and portfolio development if a paid role is not available at the end of the internship
* 🌟 A chance to join a vibrant community of artists, creators, and collaborators in Stockholm

title: IT Upphandlingskonsult
description:
***Vår vision är "Sveriges ledande upphandlingskonsulter som driver
   

  

 digital transformation, hållbarhet och verksamhetsutveckling."***
***Vi tillhandahåller expertkunskap inom hela upphandlingsområdet i form av kompetenta upphandlingsprojektledare, kravanalytiker, inköpsutvecklare och upphandlingsjurister. Vi är med genom hela inköpsprocessen från analys av verksamhetsbehov, strategiska vägval, genomförande och införande.***
 Som IT-Upphandlingskonsult hos oss kommer du att vara med i B3 leverans till offentlig sektor och du kommer att få en viktig roll med stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets och din egen utveckling. Vi är en liten organisation som är del av B3 Consulting Group vilket gör att vi får det bästa av två världar, en platt organisation med härlig kultur som är en del av en stor koncern med bred kompetens och många års gedigen erfarenhet inom IT och Management.
   

  

**Rollen**
 I rollen som Upphandlingskonsult hjälper du våra kunder att genomföra komplexa och omfattande IT-upphandlingar. Du arbetar antingen på egen hand eller tillsammans med specialister från våra andra dotterbolag inom B3 koncernen. Hos oss kommer du alltid att ha ett nätverk av riktigt kompetenta kollegor att utbyta erfarenheter med!
   

  

 Rollen innefattar en rad olika arbetsuppgifter, som exempelvis:
   

  

* Utredningar och analyser av kunders inköpsprocesser och inköpsorganisationer
* Strategisk rådgivning i inköpsprocessen, som exempelvis att välja strategi och upphandlingsform
* Hjälpa våra kunder genom hela upphandlingsprocessen
* Kvalitetssäkring av Upphandlingsdokumentation och avtal
* Utveckling och förnyelse av den offentliga verksamheten


**Kvalifikationer**
* Vi tror att du har 4+ års erfarenhet i rollen som IT-Upphandlare/Upphandlingskonsult med ansvar för genomförandet av komplexa upphandlingar enligt LOU/LUF
* Erfarenhet från stora upphandlande myndigheter är meriterande men inget krav


 B3 Upphandling är en del av B3 koncernen. Vi prioriterar frihet och balans i livet och har vunnit priser för vårt wellnesskoncept. Vi tror på att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bättre och satsar därför stort på att bygga en varm, kreativ och öppen kultur i bolaget. Vi gillar att hitta på saker och arrangerar löpande olika aktiviteter, allt från cross fit till musikquiz.
   

  

 Hållbarhet är också ett ledord för oss på B3 och det gäller såväl våra sociala initiativ, som hur vi jobbar med vår viktigaste tillgång – våra medarbetare. B3 fungerar som en bas för våra konsulter där de finner stöd och får möjligheter att umgås, lära sig nya saker och bygga på kunskap.
   

  

 B3 är utsedd av Great Place to work till en av Europas bästa arbetsplatser och Sveriges bästa arbetsplats inom kategorin Large Workplaces.

title: Director, IT Strategy Consulting, SAP
description:
**About The Role**
 Gartner Consulting is experiencing accelerating demand for independent, strategic advice in the SAP domain. We are seeking seasoned SAP professionals to join our Nordic & European team, delivering end-to-end SAP strategy and transformation services that drive measurable client value and impact. You will work across both public sector and commercial industries, partnering with leading organizations to guide their SAP transformation journeys—especially the transition to S/4HANA.
   

  

**Why Join Gartner Consulting?**
* Influence the SAP transformation journeys of leading organizations across the Nordic and EMEA regions.
* Work alongside a team of recognized experts in a collaborative, growth-focused environment.
* Access to Gartner’s industry-leading research, methodologies, and professional development resources.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.


 As a member of our expert team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and executing SAP-enabled business transformations, moving beyond strategy development to deliver tangible value realization. You will contribute to the ongoing development and maturity of Gartner’s Enterprise Applications consulting practice, leveraging Gartner’s research and best practices to enhance client outcomes.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Advise C-suite and senior stakeholders on SAP strategy, transformation roadmaps, and S/4HANA migration, aligning technology initiatives with business objectives.
* Drive and guide SAP transformation engagements, from initial strategic assessment and business case development through implementation, change management, and value realization.
* Develop and refine methodologies, tools, and approaches to accelerate client impact and ensure delivery excellence.
* Identify and pursue opportunities to expand client relationships and grow the SAP consulting practice across the Nordic and EMEA regions.
* Deliver quality assurance on key project deliverables, ensuring alignment with Gartner’s high standards and client expectations.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovation, share thought leadership, and contribute to go-to-market strategies.


**Ideal Candidate Profile**
* Extensive experience in client-facing consulting roles, with a proven track record of leading SAP transformation programs for large, complex organizations.
* Deep understanding of SAP S/4HANA and core SAP modules (Finance, HR, Supply Chain), including target state definition, business case development, and migration planning.
* Demonstrated ability to baseline existing SAP/ERP environments and architect transition strategies to S/4HANA-enabled future states.
* Exceptional executive communication and stakeholder management skills, with experience presenting to CxO-level audiences.
* Strategic thinker with the ability to develop and deliver compelling analysis and presentations that drive client decision-making.
* Experience in developing and maturing SAP service offerings, including methodologies, deliverables, and go-to-market plans.
* Strong business development acumen, with a history of identifying and realizing SAP/ERP expansion opportunities.
* Commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of SAP trends, best practices, and industry developments.
* Required: Eligible for Finnish security clearance.
* Required: Fluent Swedish


**Who you are:**
* Comfortable selling to, influencing and building trust-based, value-added relationships with senior executives
* Coachable and embracing of best practices and feedback as a means of continuous improvement
* A consistently high achiever marked by perseverance, humility and a positive outlook in the face of challenges
* Proven track record in achieving / exceeding revenue targets
* Ability to travel to client sites as necessary


 Associates are expected to travel to client sites and meetings as required by business needs or specific engagement requirements, ensuring we deliver exceptional service where it matters most. While we value the flexibility of our hybrid work environment, in-person collaboration with clients and teams is an essential part of how we work and grow together.
   

  

**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective business and technology insights, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to 21,000 associates globally who support ~14,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our vast, virtually untapped market potential offers limitless opportunities – opportunities that may not even exist right now – for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
   

  

 Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.
   

  

 Job Requisition ID:83178
   

  

 By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
   

  

 Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy
